content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the marijampolė district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between the parties involved the movable property that was divided includes various items such as a motorbike freezer kitchen corner toilet trimmer lawn mower cooker trailer boat engine washing machine pipes water pumps bicycle and firewood the court awarded the applicant 15 of a plot of land and the aforementioned movable property the defendant was also awarded 15 of a plot of land a boat engine washing machine pipes water pumps bicycle and firewood additionally the defendant has been ordered to pay compensation for receiving a greater share of the property the court referred to different articles of the civil code related to matrimonial property the case involved the dissolution of a marriage establishment of residence for the children and maintenance for the children the court awarded maintenance for the children and divided the matrimonial property the defendant filed a counterclaim and later withdrew a claim for contestation of paternity the court ordered the defendant to pay financial compensation and the costs of the proceedings the applicant also filed a defense and amended counterclaim which resulted in the court awarding various properties to the applicant and ordering financial compensation to be paid by the defendant the court explained the principles of division of matrimonial property and the determination of fair value the court divided the immovable and movable property between the parties resolved disputes regarding the value of certain items and ordered the defendant to pay monetary compensation the court also ordered the parties to pay the costs of the proceedings the interim measures regarding maintenance were lifted and the judgment is enforceable the marriage between the parties is being dissolved and the property acquired during the marriage is divided accordingly
